annotation.spannedText: Vaccination is one of the best ways parents can protect infants, children and teens from 16 potentially harmful diseases

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccination is one of the best ways parents can protect infants, children and teens from 16 potentially harmful diseases

annotation.spannedText: Vaccine-preventable diseases can be very serious, may require hospitalization, or even be deadly – especially in infants and young children

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccine-preventable diseases can be very serious, may require hospitalization, or even be deadly – especially in infants and young children
